evidence.claim: Wax Custom Communications utilizes AWS for their cloud services.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, indicating handling of sensitive health information.
Wax Custom Communications implements FHIR standards in their health-tech solutions.
X12 transaction sets are used for electronic data interchange at Wax Custom Communications.
Azure is mentioned as part of their cloud infrastructure.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in EDI integration and supports healthcare transaction sets including X12.
